leadDangerZone.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete the lead and ALL related data: projects, sessions, reminders/notes, payments, services, and activities.

deleteLeadDialog.title: Delete Lead
deleteLeadDialog.description: Type the lead's name ("{{name}}") or DELETE to confirm. This will permanently delete the lead and ALL related data including projects, sessions, reminders/notes, payments, services, and activities.
deleteLeadDialog.successDescription: Lead and all related data deleted successfully.

sessions_form.title: Sessions
sessions_form.add_sessions_hint: Schedule your first session to get started

danger_zone.title: Danger Zone
danger_zone.description: These actions are destructive and cannot be undone. Proceed with caution.

kanban_settings.title: Kanban Card Settings
kanban_settings.description: Customize what information appears on your project cards. Perfect for solo photographers who want a cleaner view.
kanban_settings.project_type_description: Show project type badges on cards
kanban_settings.todo_progress_description: Show todo progress bar on cards
kanban_settings.session_count_description: Show session count icons on cards
kanban_settings.service_count_description: Show service count icons on cards
kanban_settings.pro_tip_description: Customize your project cards to show exactly what you need to manage your photography business efficiently.

projects.pageSubtitle: Manage all your projects in one place
projects.welcomeTutorialTitle: Welcome to Your Project Management Hub
projects.welcomeTutorialDescription: Let's explore three powerful ways to view and organize your photography projects.
projects.boardViewDescription: Try dragging a project to a different column to see how the board view works.
projects.boardViewTooltip: Drag a project to a different column to continue
projects.listViewDescription: Click the 'List' tab above to see project information in a table format.
projects.listViewContent: List view is perfect when you need to see detailed information about multiple projects at once, with sorting and filtering capabilities. This view is great for data analysis and making informed decisions.
projects.listViewTooltip: Click the List tab above to continue
projects.archivedDescription: Click the 'Archived' tab above to see how completed projects are organized.
projects.archivedContent: The archived view keeps completed projects separate from active ones, helping you keep your workspace clean. This keeps past projects accessible for reference and portfolio building while you focus on current work.
projects.archivedTooltip: Click the Archived tab above to continue
projects.completionContent: You now know how to navigate between different project views. Each view has its strengths—use the board for workflow management, the list for detailed analysis, and the archived view for completed projects.

leadDangerZone.deleteWarning: This will permanently delete the lead and ALL related data: projects, sessions, reminders/notes, payments, services, and activities.

status.unsupportedStageDesc: This stage cannot be applied to sessions yet.
